MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PA6 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in North Street and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.00PM due to repairs required to a piece of electrical equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.22PM on 03 April 2021.
